settings.text: Cool Cats bring the party wherever we go.

Drinking brings us together, literally and figuratively. It’s our chance to meet new people and experience new cultures. In fact, studies show that cocktails consumed in a social setting can promote positive emotions and social bonding. When we strengthen our social ties, we become more resilient during harder times, too. Sounds like a total win to us!

Drinking brings us together, literally and figuratively. It’s our chance to meet new people and experience new cultures. In fact, studies show that cocktails consumed in a social setting can promote positive emotions and social bonding. When we strengthen our social ties, we become more resilient during harder times, too. Sounds like a total win to us!

Drinking brings us together, literally and figuratively. It’s our chance to meet new people and experience new cultures. In fact, studies show that cocktails consumed in a social setting can promote positive emotions and social bonding. When we strengthen our social ties, we become more resilient during harder times, too. Sounds like a total win to us!

The fact is, Cool Cats are the life of any party. We’re the fun ones. The loud ones. The ones holding court at the middle of the table. We’re always up for anything, and we’re ready to celebrate at a moment’s notice. Throwing a pool bash? We’re diving in. Hosting a dinner party? What can we bring? (Hint: It comes in four flavors, and is bubbly and light.) A night out at the club? Yes, please! We probably know the DJ.

And while Cool Cats may love a good time, we understand the importance of balance. Movement and nature are key ingredients for nurturing our physical and mental well-being. Thankfully, our guilt-free Cool Cat spritzers (only 150 calories each) go hand-in-hand with the free-spirited lifestyle we love. Cheers to that! But we also know that the everyday moments with friends, family, and even ourselves are worth celebrating, too, and you don’t need to be at the club for that. Cool Cats bring the fun wherever we go. The key is knowing how to find it.

So, put your damn phone down (dare we say for at least an hour), and find something that brings you genuine joy whether you’re alone or with your pack. Sing at the top of your lungs in the shower, laugh your ass off with your best bud in the park, or round up the crew and rage all night. No matter what, make finding fun a priority in your life. You won’t regret it

The Music

Make sure to mix it up with some newer and older tunes and some remixes of crowd faves. Whether you’re sitting on the deck, splashing around in the pool, or laughing around the fire pit, one of these killer Cool Cat summer mixes is guaranteed to create the perfect vibe. Just hit play and let the music take control.

The Backyard Fun 

At any Cool Cat event, fun is a given, but make sure you have some activities for the crew so the chat doesn’t turn to pandemics or gas prices.

When you learn how to celebrate life no matter where you are, it reflects in your health, your flow, your relationships, and your overall vibe. Now THAT’S a reason to live it up.

Party Like a rockstar? Please, that’s so 2007. If you want to sit at our table, it’s time to find the fun and party like a Cool Cat. The stars are made of us, and we own the night.
